item.description:
I heard that a nice group gathered last week so that's a great reason to schedule more playing this week. I may or may not show up but most of you recognize each other by now and please be on the lookout for newcomers and make them feel welcome.

By the way, the Single Event is playing at Conard on Thursday night at 6 pm.

It's hard to believe this weekend is August but we'll have tennis until they take down the nets in the fall (or later).

As usual, I can be reached at 860-559-7983 for questions or comments. Have fun.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Tennis Saturday at Conard
